Antonio House Hostel

Fontanka River embankment 51/53, 191014, St Petersburg, Russia

Description


Located in the center of St Petersburg, the Antonio House hostel offers friendly budget accommodation. Guests will enjoy monthly photo exhibition in the hostel.

The Antonio House hostel offers 4 types of rooms with 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 or 10 new beds.

Rooms are equipped with:
  • Clean sheets, pillows, and blankets included in the price
  • Large lockers for baggage storage
Facilities available to guests:
  • Open all year round, 24h a day
  • Safe deposit box at the reception
  • TV room with table games, comfortable sofas
  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • The hotel accepts Visa, Mastercard, Eurocard, and Maestro credit cards.

Book now

We are searching for available rooms and prices. Please wait...

Location

The Antonio House hotel is located in in the center of St.Petersburg, between the three central metro stations: "Gostinny Dvor", "Dostoevskaya" and "Sadovaya".

Persons checking Antonio House Hostel are also interested in the following hotels:

Anabel at Nevsky 88

The budget-friendly Anabel is located on Nevsky Prospekt, 2 minutes from the Metro and 10 minutes from the Moscow Rail Terminal, and offers free Wi-Fi. Wake in a quiet room, with rooms overlooking the inner courtyard allowing a peaceful sleep. A tasty complimentary breakfast is a great way to start the day. Between 5pm and 7pm, guests can enjoy complimentary tea and coffee at Anabel. ...
Antique-hotel Rachmaninov

Comfortable hotel set in the center of St Pestersburg, in a former house of the famous composer Rachmaninov, designed like a museum of noble life in 19th century Russia, decorated with antiques and old photos. Guests will enjoy photo exhibition and rich excursions program. There are stylish rooms with Internet access. There is one studio with a kitchen. ...
Apartment Griboedova 20

Modern one bedroom apartment including a bedroom with 2 double beds, living room, full bathroom with a hairdryer and kitchen, for up to 4 people or 2+2. ...
